definition: a device produced by pressure on a surface, to mark or stamp with or as if with pressure
details:
noun
- a device produced by pressure on a surface
- a distinctive influence
= example: a distinctive influence
- an impression produced by pressure or printing
= example: an impression produced by pressure or printing
- an identification of a publisher
= example: an identification of a publisher
- a concavity in a surface produced by pressing
= example: a concavity in a surface produced by pressing
verb
- to mark or stamp with or as if with pressure
= example: to mark or stamp with or as if with pressure
- to establish or impress firmly in the mind
= example: to establish or impress firmly in the mind
